content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. May I please have your name to assist you with your electrical service needs?
Thank you, John. Could you please provide your address so I can check the availability of our service in your area?
Thanks for the address. Let me check if you're in our service area.
John, you're within our service area. When would be an ideal time for us to perform the electrical service?
I’m not sure about the timing yet. I’m trying to get quotes from a few other companies before I decide on scheduling anything.
I understand completely, John. Feel free to reach out to us anytime when you're ready to schedule your service. If you have any questions or need an estimate, I'm here to help!
reason: Customer wants to get quotes from other companies first
